text: "Feliz Navidad" is a 1970 Christmas song by Puerto Rican singer José Feliciano and is the title track to his Christmas album Feliz Navidad. It is a regular chart single around the festive holiday period. It is about being homesick and missing his family in New York City. ==References== Category:1970 songs Category:Christmas songs Category:José Feliciano songs Category:Boney M. songs Category:Thalía songs Category:Michael Bublé songs Category:Latin pop songs
title: Feliz Navidad (song)
